abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Happy Dance Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Flip a coin for each [W] Energy attached to Ludicolo. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
